info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 7 at 6:48PM EDT until August 7 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following counties, Hillsborough and Pasco.
* WHEN...Until 845 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 648 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Lutz, Brandon, University, Pebble Creek, Lake Magdalene, East Lake-Orient Park, Land O Lakes, Lettuce Lake Park, University Of South Florida, New Tampa, Busch Gardens, Tampa Executive Airport, Florida State Fairgrounds, Orient Park, Wesley Chapel, Thonotosassa, Mango and Seffner. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT THIS EVENING
